features: 【Safety Fast Charging】Equipped with high quality 18W fast charger and 3.3ft type-c charging cable, enable fully charge in just 2 to 3 hours,get a boosted at 30% faster than other iphone wireless charger. Besides,with advanced FCC approval,our 3 in 1 charging station uses the latest chip to boost efficiency and improve heat dissipation,and provides temperature control and voltage protection,and short-circuit prevention.There are cooling holes on the back,no need to worry it gets extremely hot.

【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all Qi-enabled Android and IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 15/15 Plus/15Pro/15 Pro max/14/14 Plus/14Pro/14 Pro max/13/13Pro/13Pro Max/13 mini/12/12Pro/12Pro Max/12 mini/11/11Pro/11Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/ 8Plus & Apple iWatch 9/8/7/6/5/4/3/2/1/SE/Ultra 1/2 & AirPods 1/2/3/Pro1/Pro2. A must device for apple fans.

【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the "sweet spot" to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.

【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won't lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.

【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a solution within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable, convenient and fast charger
reviews.reviewText: The 3-in-1 iPhone charger stand impresses with its sleek design and functionality. Its ability to simultaneously charge my iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch makes it a convenient solution for decluttering my charging space. The adjustable stand provides a comfortable viewing angle, and the build quality feels sturdy. However, the charging speed could be faster for all devices. Overall, it's a practical accessory for Apple enthusiasts seeking a tidy charging solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and charges quick
reviews.reviewText: It’s super compact and charges my iphone and watch fast! so far so good!!! love how easy it was to set up and how light weight! the color is also really pretty and smooth! great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best at-home and travel device ever
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this charger for myself. Once I saw how convenient and reliable it was, I purchased another for my daughter who travels a lot for business. It’s so much more convenient to put into your luggage as it is compact and charges your iPhone, Apple Watch, and earbuds. I own two myself and have purchased more for gifts. Do yourself a favor, OWN IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, works, charges slow.
reviews.reviewText: It's not bad but it does charge fairly slow compared to my other one. Bought this one for my grandma because her apartment is tiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a steal
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing at the price point. It does not take up lots of room like the others it charges fast and so easy to use and set up. I love this. Trust me I have tried and returned 3other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that I can plug the charger into a usb port on my lamp no wires hanging down it’s nice and neat. Charges quickly I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Charges all 3 devices
reviews.reviewText: Convenient and easy to use. Charges phone with case on. All in one eliminates 3 cords to one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This charging station's standout feature is its ability to simultaneously charge multiple Apple devices. With dedicated spots for an IPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods, it streamlines the charging process, reducing cable clutter and ensuring that all essential devices are ready for use. The wireless charging capability is particularly beneficial when traveling, eliminating the need to carry multiple chargers and untangle cords, contributing to a more organized and stress-free charging experience. While it may not boast the fastest charging speeds, its ability to handle multiple devices simultaneously, and wireless charging capability is perfect for users who prioritize convenience and organization.
